content: an evening at julie s is a super bulky weight hat that uses rt right twists and lt left twists to create a diamond pattern no cable needle needed **yarn ** any super bulky yarn i used malabrigo rasta in the baya electrica colourway **needles ** 8 00mm and 9 00mm on a 16 cord 9 00mm dpn s or magic loop for small circumferences **gauge ** 10 sts / 4 **other materials needed ** scissors darning needle stitch marker hope you enjoy the pattern post your project so everyone can see your work
